homeHeroSection.homeHeaderSubtitle: Activate the raw force within you and liberate, expand and open your heart to your own divinity

homeKapStatementSection.homeKapStatement: KAP is a transmission of non-dual awareness and kundalini energy

homeKapSessionSection.homeKapSessionTitlte: Ready to Activate the Raw Force Within You?
homeKapSessionSection.homeKapSessionDescription1: Liberate, expand and open your heart to your own divinity.
homeKapSessionSection.homeKapSessionDescription2: The ultimate goal of the practice is to expand consciousness but early side effects for some participants are stress reduction and improvement of wellbeing.

homeKapFacilitatorSection.homeKapFacilitatorDescription1: The most accredited and profesional facilitator to guide you and support you through the awakening process.
homeKapFacilitatorSection.homeKapFacilitatorDescription2: The mission of a facilitator is to work as a energy vehicle to the empowerment and transformation of yourself.

homeKapWorkplaceSection.homeKapWorkplaceDescription1: Our sacred space is a place of love.
homeKapWorkplaceSection.homeKapWorkplaceDescription2: The studio’s mission is to cultivate a sense of community where Kundalini Activation Process participants feel safe to fully experience their raw nature and explore all of its layers.
homeKapWorkplaceSection.homeKapWorkplaceDescription3: The intimate space is ideal for those who want to enter in communion with themselves in a safe container.

descriptionList.item: Session open to a private group
Full day immersion experience, by invitation only
Semi-private: Session exclusive for a private group
KAP retreats will be held in the US and Costa Rica

homeKapTestimonialList.name: Nathalie
homeKapTestimonialList.description: The power and kindness of a KAP session with Eugenia: I moved at a slow pace with arms, back and neck. Movements initiated in the moment not by the mind. At some point I could feel a pain all over my back, I stretched my back and I knew to stay with it until it disappeared. An intense experience, a pain connected to me and female generations before me, a shared pain. Now finding its moment to be released. I move more, fulfilling the need for yoga poses that I do not practice usually, and further marinating in the Kundalini energy. So pure, so loving.

homeKapTestimonialList.name: Aline
homeKapTestimonialList.description: Eugenia is such a sweet woman. I think the path of the holistic/spiritual world requires a lot of love and Eugenia definitely has that to offer, she is capable of connecting with you on a deep level no just for the KAP experience but you can feel a soulful connection with her.

homeKapTestimonialList.name: Hazel
homeKapTestimonialList.description: Eugenia's work is a precious gift and a KAP with her is a gift to one's soul. She held our small group with grace and total focus, following allowing the energy to flow and ebb, rise and fall, move and become stillness. I was entranced and entrained, moving through emotions and their physicality with a power intensity that defied my logical mind... and so allowing another layer of healing to express and another breath of consciousness to awaken. Life changing. Thank you Eugenia for your courage and integrity.

homeKapTestimonialList.name: Lorelli
homeKapTestimonialList.description: I had an online session, which worked great since I don't live in the city and I'm sure that a lot of people interested in this practice live far too, so this way it reaches more people. My experience was great, hard to describe, but very awesome. The instructor Eugenia is amazing, very patient explaining all the details about the session and what to expect. I do recommend it!

homeKapTestimonialList.name: Therese
homeKapTestimonialList.description: I had the pleasure of a KAP session with the lovely Eugenia of Inner Fuel. It was a wonderful experience with a lot of blocked energy some old grief released. Eugenia is a kind thorough facilitator and you feel safe respected in the session. I noticed residual effects over the next days, and highly recommend this process to anyone everyone. I look forward to having this experience again!

homeKapTestimonialList.name: Laura D
homeKapTestimonialList.description: The experience I encountered was literally releasing, detoxing of my soul. This energy took over my inner being. I cried and let out all that doesn't serve me. I then recognized that I am more than my thoughts. I have been awakened to this secret we have inside us. After my session with Eugenia, I have been really acknowledging what life is. I cried all the way home because this has awakened my soul and I will forever be grateful. I will keep doing this practice because once you open up to your soul and energy, there's no turning back. Eugenia I'm coming back!!! I want more!

homeKapTestimonialList.name: Cristell Palma
homeKapTestimonialList.description: An excellent experience! Since you arrive you feel a lot of harmony and peace in the place. During the session I could feel how the energy moved inside me, there came a moment where I could feel a lot of peace. I definitely recommend it!

homeKapMediaSection.homeKapMediaDescription1: Take a look at our most recent video production where Eugenia ran a KAP session in a secluded beach area in California's coast line.
homeKapMediaSection.homeKapMediaDescription2: It also features a beautiful sand mandala by Beacons Mandala.
homeKapMediaSection.homeKapMediaImgDescription: Kap Session in San Diego, California

homeKapSubscriptionSection.homeKapSubscriptionDescription: Receive KAP updates and invitations to KAP sessions and special events
